name: Select a product and complete the purchase

testSteps.description: Given I am on the AutomationExercises homepage

children.description: Given I am on the AutomationExercises homepage
Levi opens the browser at https://automationexercise.com

children.description: When the user selects the product "Blue top"
And adds the product to the cart
And goes to the cart from the View Cart link
Then the order should be successfully confirmed

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  I want to select a product
  So that I can add it to the cart and proceed to checkout

title: Select a product and complete the purchase
